description: Thymilph the Crasher is the first of the Spiral King`s Four Supreme Generals introduced in the story, representing the classical element of fire. He is Viral`s initial superior officer and the commander of the Human Eradication Army Eastern Branch, which he monitors from the deck of the land battleship, the Dai-Gunzan. He is good friends with Adiane, though Guame insinuates a closer relationship.
name: Thymilph
